column4: why isnt estimated time left showing up in my Power History?
Power Manager is not showing estimated time history. Help?
trying to boot to a usb drive, but getting 'cannot find kernel: linux'
any ideas what the issue might be?
what are the contents of your syslinux.cgf file?
if the file is empty, open it in gedit and type:
sorry, didn't think it was enough to bother with a PB
the contents of syslinux folder should be present in the root directory of the usb, as well as inside the syslinux folder. keep both the folder, as well as copy its files to the root directory.
same with the install folder, and initrd.gz and vmlinuz inside casper, besides the syslinux folder.
you mean they all need to be at root?
